channel.title: Interaction Design on Supriya Dutta
channel.description: Recent content in Interaction Design on Supriya Dutta

item.title: Visualizing Radiology data
item.description: Predible Health is an AI startup. They work with Artificial Intelligence to draw out information from Radiology data. We collaborated on a project to create physical reports for the users â€“ Pulmonologist, radiologist, and patients. The objective of the project was to find an effective way of representing the Lung CT Scan data into a medical report, specially catered to our target users. The data we wanted to present was divided into three sections: Nodule analysis data, Low Attenuation analysis data, and High Attenuation analysis data.

item.title: 600 years of Ahom Kingdom
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Data Visualization Guide Tools used Prof. Vekatesh Rajamanickam d3js, mapbox, QGIS Link BTS 600 years of Ahom Kingdom Behind the Screens: 600 years of Ahom Kingdom Ahoms dynasty were the most celebrated in assamese history.

item.title: Zuci: Multiplayer Phy-gital game
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Game Design, Interaction Design Guide Tools used Prof. Uday Athavankar Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Awards User Centricity Award Folk musical instruments form an integral part of one's community. Due to the lack of practitioners, rigorous processes of construction(of these instruments) the audience base of these instruments have decreased considerably.

item.title: Eat - o - pia
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Game Design, Interaction Design Guide Tools used Prof. Uday Athavankar Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Eat-o-pia is a 4-player hybrid or Phy-gital game. This was an exploratory project, created as a tool to help kids understand Foodchain. The aim of this game was to show the relationship between different animals, and their relationship with food.
